item.description: Optical Character Recognition Our pipeline to automatically recognize handwritten text includes: page segmentation (first divided into a large block) [1] and line segmentation (then split into lines) [2], followed by handwriting recognition is illustrated in Figure ! [image] (Selection_109.png) The pipeline of this component is presented in Figure 2. The input is an image containing a line of text and the output of the module is a string of the text.
